channel.title: Posts on Lost For Words
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Lost For Words

item.title: Ipswich
item.description: We moved to Ipswich in the late 1970s. We’d bumbled about south-east Queensland after moving from New Zealand, until we finally settled on the outskirts of arguably Queensland’s second-most-important town (at the time, at least), in a caravan park in the suburb of Tivoli. It wasn’t a great caravan park, all told, but I was 5 or 6 so what did I care? Not long after, we moved to a house in North Ipswich, a suburb across the bridge from the main center of Ipswich City.
